full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Request for Proposal:** Cylinder, Compressed Gas
------------------------------------------------

**Reference Number:** cb-447-47130148
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-258411/A
**Publication Date:** 2024-10-28
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-11-27T14:00:00

**Procurement Details:**
------------------------

* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Request Description:**
-------------------------

The Canadian Forces have a requirement for the following items:

* **Item 1:** Compressed Gas Cylinders
	+ NSN: 01-336-8668
	+ Quantity: 5
	+ Unit of Issue: EA
	+ Delivery Location: 25 CFSD Montreal
	+ Delivery Date: 28 February 2025
	+ Supporting Documents: See attached RFP document (PDF)

**Submission Requirements:**
----------------------------

* **Submission Method:** Electronic submission via epost Connect service is strongly encouraged.
* **Language:** Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information:**
-------------------------

* **Point of Contact:** Dany Lebel
* **Email:** dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (000) 000-0000

**Attachments:**
----------------

* RFP document: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/50148/w8485-258411a---cylinder-compressed-gas-rfp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/50148/w8485-258411a---cylinder-compressed-gas-rfp.pdf)
* Notification of Proposed Procurement: EN [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/50148/w8485-258411a---bouteille%2C-gaz-comprime-ddp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/50148/w8485-258411a---bouteille%2C-gaz-comprime-ddp.pdf)

Note: The effects of the pandemic on business hours and limited staff at the designated bid receiving unit should be taken into consideration for bid submissions. The use of the epost Connect
